title: Steve Cummings Confirms Ineos Grenadiers Exit After Months of Speculation About His Role
content:
Cummings was not featured in the team's high-profile makeover released last month: 'I've reached the decision to step away from Ineos.'

Read the full article at Steve Cummings Confirms Ineos Grenadiers Exit After Months of Speculation About His Role on Velo.
author: ahood
